resources.string: Send email with Bisq Phone ID
Bisq is an open-source desktop application that allows you to buy and sell bitcoins in exchange for national currencies, or alternative crypto currencies.
Do you want to use your computer\'s webcam or do you want to send an email to yourself?
Now you can receive Bisq notifications on your phone.
Please copy this Bisq Phone ID string into the field \"Bisq Phone ID\" in the Bisq App:\n\n

\n\nThe Bisq Phone ID contains (1) your excryption key (AES/CBC/NOPadding with initialization vector) which is used by Bisq to encrypt the notifications for you and (2) a token from Apple that identifies this instance of the Bisq remote app.
Please open your email on your computer and paste the Phone ID into Bisq \n(Settings -> Bisq Mobile)

Go to your computer and open the Bisq App.

Settings -> Bisq Mobile

Then press "Webcam" and scan the QR code
